document.full_text: minnesota sued encore capital group inc, one of the largest u.s. debt collectors, for allegedly using fraudulent "robo-signed" affidavits in collection cases, a practice that critics say also infects home foreclosures.
document.title: minnesota sues debt collector for robo-signing
lines_and_colors: minnesota sued encore capital group inc, one of the largest u.s. debt collectors, for allegedly using fraudulent "robo-signed" affidavits in collection cases, a practice that critics say also infects home foreclosures.
